'''Intertwined Fate''' can be used for [[:Category:Event Wishes|Event Wishes]].

It is the Event Wish counterpart of [[Acquaint Fate]]s, which are used on [[Wanderlust Invocation]] and [[Beginners' Wish]].

==How To Obtain==
* [[Paimon's Bargains]]
** Purchase 1 with 160 [[Primogem]]s (unlimited &mdash; can also be exchanged in the [[Wishes]] menu)
** Purchase 1 with 5 [[Masterless Starglitter]] (unlimited)
** Purchase 1 with 75 [[Masterless Stardust]] (5 per month, refreshes on the first day of each month)
* [[Battle Pass]] - [[Gnostic Hymn]] Reward
** 1 Rewarded at levels 10, 20, 30, and 40
* [[Frostbearing Tree's Gratitude]]
** 2 Rewarded at level 6
* [[Sacred Sakura's Favor]]
** 2 Rewarded at levels 10, 20, 30, 40, and 50
* [[Enhance the Lumenstone Adjuvant]]
** 2 Rewarded at level 8
*[[Vanarana's Favor]]
**2 Rewarded at level 10, 20, and 30
*[[Adventurer Handbook]]
**1 Rewarded for every completed [[Archon Quest]] act
* Certain [[Events]], such as [[Passage of Clouds and Stars]]
